author: Delaney Chambers
description: In a dramatic video, a sea lion can be seen dragging a young girl into a marina after she and others fed it from a dock.
title: Watch: Why This Sea Lion Dragged a Girl Into the Sea

author: BBC News
description: Experts warn against getting too close to wild animals after a sea lion pulls a young girl underwater.
title: The moment a sea lion pulls a girl underwater

description: Watch as a sea lion attacks and drags a young girl into the waters at the Steveston Fisherman's Wharf, Richmond B.C. Canada. The girl was rescued by her fami...
title: Killer Sea lion drags girl into Steveston waters

author: https://www.facebook.com/NBCNews
description: Parents of little girl dragged into the water by a sea lion should have known better, a Canadian port chief says.
title: An official at the port where the girl was snatched by a sea lion blames her parents

author: https://www.facebook.com/NBCNews
description: A cellphone video captured the rescue of a young girl who was dragged and pulled by her dress into a Canadian harbor by a wild sea lion on Saturday.
title: Dramatic video captures sea lion dragging girl into water

author: Nicola Slawson
description: Girl shaken but physically unharmed after large sea lion grabs her dress and pulls her into the water near Vancouver, Canada
title: Video: California sea lion grabs girl from dock and pulls her underwater

description: Port officials are lambasting the family of a young girl seen dragged into the water by a sea lion for "reckless behaviour" leading to the attack off a dock at Steveston in Richmond, B.C.
title: Family slammed for 'reckless behaviour' after sea lion drags girl into water in Richmond, B.C.
